title: Performance-Based Online Learning Assessment Model Design for K-12

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Experience with Digital Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Non-degree adult-targeted science education course conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply performance-based assessment criteria at least 80% of the time during the science experiment design and analysis process.
Learners can self-diagnose their learning process at least three times using process mining tools provided on the LMS platform.
Learners can achieve at least 75% accuracy in solving science problems presented through the 2-Tuple Fuzzy Linguistic evaluation method.
Learners can address individual learning gaps at least twice through a knowledge-based recommendation system.

resources: FANP (Fuzzy Analytic Network Process) evaluation template
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
